column2:
```r
itsea <-
  itsea %>%
  group_by(ID) %>% 
  mutate(
    itsea_symptoms = sum(
      c(
        itsea_intern,
        itsea_extern,
        itsea_negemo
        ), na.rm = TRUE
      ),
    itsea_competence = sum(
      c(
        itsea_play,
        itsea_empath,
        itsea_social
      ), na.rm = TRUE
    )
  ) %>% 
  ungroup() 
```
